N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 228.2 - Requirements for referee test

State Regulations

Whenever any utility receives notice from this commission
that a customer has requested a referee test of his/her gas meter, the utility
shall replace the meter within 10 days unless it is of a type usually tested in
the field. In the latter case, the utility shall provide appropriate personnel
and equipment to assist in the field-testing of the accuracy of the meter by
this commission. If a meter cannot be made available for a referee test within
the time specified, written notice shall be sent to this commission giving the
causes for the delay. Notes
